subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Nathan Sturgis scored in the 47th minute, and Clint Irwin had his sixth shutout of the season for Colorado, which last lost at home to the Red Bulls on July 8, 2007.
snippet: Nathan Sturgis scored in the 47th minute, and Clint Irwin had his sixth shutout of the season for Colorado, which last lost at home to the Red Bulls on July 8, 2007.
